item.title: Windows Phone â€“ Context Menu on a ListBox
item.description: Ok, I have been working on updating one of my windows phone app, Swatch 7. I added a feature that allows user to save the color they picked. I have write more on that on another post, maybe after the app on the marketplace is updated.
